description: Cranberry cocktails are a must-try this holiday season. They are warm, spicy, refreshing, and tart due to the cranberries, citrus, and ginger beer. If you don't like&nbsp;whiskey, you can substitute&nbsp;vodka for whiskey in this recipe.
keywords: How To Make Cranberry Orange Whiskey
name: Cranberry Orange Whiskey

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients except the ginger beer in a cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients except the ginger beer in a cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake vigorously for 30 seconds, then strain into a chilled glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake vigorously for 30 seconds, then strain into a chilled glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Finish with ginger beer and garnish with orange peel and fresh thyme.
recipeInstructions.text: Finish with ginger beer and garnish with orange peel and fresh thyme.
